MoClo YTK.description: Single and multi-gene constructs for S. cerevisiae expression from plasmids or integrated into the genome

POMBOX.description: YTK-based Fission Yeast Cloning Toolkit for Molecular and Synthetic Biology

MoClo YSD.description: Extension to the MoClo YTK kit to optimize secretion and cell surface display of proteins of interest

Golden PiCS.description: Flexible modular system for advanced strain engineering in P. pastoris / K. phaffii
